BRIEFING:
ROUTED ECHO CROSSING TO CHARLIE DUE TO OBS TS NORTH OF HAWAII ALTITUDE CAPPED AT FL290 TO FACILITATE CROSS TRACK
SPEED UP DUE TO LONGER ROUTE AND ENROUTE TIME
ADDITIONAL FUEL ADDED FOR ANY WX DEVIATIONS ON DEPARTURE
THREAT:
FCST MOD TURB FROM DEPARTURE TO ELOYI. TOP FL390
SIGMET QUEBEC FOR EMBD TS NORTH OF HAWAII. TOP
SPACE WEATHER: NONE
MEL-CDL M21-63-02B COCKPIT/CABIN TRIM AIR VALVES
